## Transport interface

Transport.

<b>Signature:</b>


## Remarks

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [connect()](./sip.js.transport.connect.md) | Connect to network. |
|  [disconnect()](./sip.js.transport.disconnect.md) | Disconnect from network. |
